message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Let's get this over with!
Your offer was very one-sided, Alice. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 40%. How about a 55/45 split? It's fair considering inflation is starting to hurt.
Alice, time is running out and we're both losing out with each round. I'm offering a 52/48 split.  It's more than your last offer and avoids dragging this out further.
